sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(TRADE_WORD_NO) AS CNT FROM TRADEBOARD
WHERE 1 = 1
AND TRADE_DEL = 1
AND WORD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchText# || '%'
AND CATEGORY_NO = 1
AND CATEGORY_NO = 2
AND CATEGORY_NO = 3
AND CATEGORY_NO = 4
AND CATEGORY_NO = 5
AND CATEGORY_NO = 6
AND CATEGORY_NO = 7
AND CATEGORY_NO = 8
AND CATEGORY_NO = 9

SELECT A.TRADE_WORD_NO,A.NO,A.TRADE_BOARD,A.WORD_TITLE,A.WORD_CONTENTS,A.BUY_PAY,A.WRITER_DATE,A.LOOKUP,A.PICTURENAME,A.NICK FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY T.TRADE_WORD_NO DESC) AS NO ,T.TRADE_WORD_NO,T.TRADE_DEL , T.TRADE_BOARD,T.WORD_TITLE,T.WORD_CONTENTS,T.BUY_PAY,TO_CHAR(T.WRITER_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRITER_DATE ,T.LOOKUP,P.PICTURENAME,I.NICK
FROM TRADEBOARD T LEFT OUTER JOIN TRADEPICTURE P ON T.TRADE_WORD_NO = P.TRADE_WORD_NO
LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBERINFO I ON T.MEMBERNO = I.MEMBERNO WHERE 1=1
AND T.WORD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchText# || '%'
AND CATEGORY_NO = 1
AND CATEGORY_NO = 2
AND CATEGORY_NO = 3
AND CATEGORY_NO = 4
AND CATEGORY_NO = 5
AND CATEGORY_NO = 6
AND CATEGORY_NO = 7
AND CATEGORY_NO = 8
AND CATEGORY_NO = 9
) A
WHERE A.NO BETWEEN #start# AND #end#
AND A.TRADE_DEL = 1
ORDER BY BUY_PAY

SELECT T.TRADE_WORD_NO,T.TRADE_BOARD,T.WORD_TITLE,T.WORD_CONTENTS,T.BUY_PAY,I.MEMBERNO, TO_CHAR(T.WRITER_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'||' '||'HH:MI:SS') AS WRITER_DATE ,P.PICTURENAME,P.PICTURENAME1,P.PICTURENAME2,P.PICTURENAME3,P.PICTURENAME4, SUBSTR(P.PICTURENAME,INSTR(P.PICTURENAME, '.', -1) +1) AS FILE_EXT,I.NICK,I.MEMBERNO
FROM TRADEBOARD T LEFT OUTER JOIN TRADEPICTURE P ON T.TRADE_WORD_NO = P.TRADE_WORD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBERINFO I ON T.MEMBERNO = I.MEMBERNO
WHERE T.TRADE_WORD_NO=#testNo#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TRADEBOARD SET LOOKUP=LOOKUP+1 WHERE TRADE_WORD_NO=#testNo#
UPDATE TRADEBOARD SET TRADE_DEL = 0 WHERE TRADE_WORD_NO=#testNo#

UPDATE TRADEBOARD SET TRADE_BOARD=#TradeProductName#, WORD_TITLE=#TradeTitle#, BUY_PAY=#TradePrice#, WORD_CONTENTS=#TradeContent#
WHERE TRADE_WORD_NO=#testNo#

UPDATE TRADEPICTURE SET PICTURENAME=#testFile# , PICTURENAME1=#testFile1# , PICTURENAME2=#testFile2# , PICTURENAME3=#testFile3# , PICTURENAME4=#testFile5#
WHERE TRADE_WORD_NO=#testNo#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT M.NAME,M.PHONE,M.ADDR,M.DETAILADDR,M.EMAIL1,M.EMAIL2,T.TRADE_STATUS_NO,T.MEMBERNO FROM TRADE T LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBERINFO M ON T.MEMBERNO = M.MEMBERNO
WHERE T.TRADE_NO=#TradeNo#

SELECT M.NAME,M.PHONE,M.ADDR,M.DETAILADDR,M.EMAIL1,M.EMAIL2,T.BUY_PAY,T.MEMBERNO FROM TRADEBOARD T LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBERINFO M ON T.MEMBERNO = M.MEMBERNO WHERE T.TRADE_WORD_NO=(SELECT TRADE_WORD_NO FROM TRADE WHERE TRADE_NO =#TradeNo#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TRADE SET TRADE_STATUS_NO=2 WHERE TRADE_NO=#TradeNo#
UPDATE TRADE SET TRADE_STATUS_NO1=2 WHERE TRADE_NO=#TradeNo#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.TRADE_WORD_NO,T.TRADE_BOARD,T.WORD_TITLE,T.WORD_CONTENTS,T.BUY_PAY,T1.TRADE_STATUS_NO,T1.TRADE_STATUS_NO1,ESCROW_WHETHER,T.MEMBERNO, TO_CHAR(T.WRITER_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'||' '||'HH:MI:SS') AS WRITER_DATE ,P.PICTURENAME,P.PICTURENAME1,P.PICTURENAME2,P.PICTURENAME3,P.PICTURENAME4, SUBSTR(P.PICTURENAME,INSTR(P.PICTURENAME, '.', -1) +1) AS FILE_EXT,I.NICK,I.MEMBERNO
FROM TRADEBOARD T LEFT OUTER JOIN TRADEPICTURE P ON T.TRADE_WORD_NO = P.TRADE_WORD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBERINFO I ON T.MEMBERNO = I.MEMBERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TRADE T1 ON T.TRADE_WORD_NO = T1.TRADE_WORD_NO
WHERE T1.TRADE_NO =#TradeNo#
SELECT T.TRADE_STATUS_NO,T.TRADE_STATUS_NO1,B.BUY_PAY FROM TRADE T LEFT OUTER JOIN TRADEBOARD B ON T.TRADE_WORD_NO = B.TRADE_WORD_NO WHERE T.TRADE_NO=#TradeNo#

SELECT TOTAL_M-TOTAL_B AS TOTAL FROM ( SELECT SUM(CHARGE_PRICE) AS TOTAL_M,MEMBERNO FROM SANIPANIMONEY WHERE MEMBERNO=#sNo# GROUP BY MEMBERNO)
T LEFT OUTER JOIN
(SELECT SUM(EXCHANGE_PRICE)AS TOTAL_B,MEMBERNO FROM SANIPANIMONEY WHERE MEMBERNO=#sNo#
GROUP BY MEMBERNO ) U ON T.MEMBERNO =U.MEMBERNO

SELECT T.DELIVERY_NO,D.DELIVERY_NAME,S.TRADE_STATUS,T.TRADE_STATUS_NO FROM TRADE T INNER JOIN DELIVERYCENTER D ON T.DELIVERY_CENTER_NO =D.DELIVERY_CENTER_NO INNER JOIN TRADESTATUS S ON T.TRADE_STATUS_NO = S.TRADE_STATUS_NO WHERE T.TRADE_NO=#TradeNo#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TRADE SET TRADE_STATUS_NO=4 WHERE TRADE_NO=#TradeNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT T.MEMBERNO FROM TRADE T INNER JOIN MEMBERINFO M ON T.MEMBERNO= M.MEMBERNO WHERE TRADE_NO=#TradeNo#
SELECT TRADE_NO FROM TRADE WHERE MEMBERNO =#sNo# AND TRADE_WORD_NO=#testNo#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MEMBERINFO SET SATIS=SATIS+#Star# WHERE MEMBERNO=#SellNo#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT SATIS,T_COUNT FROM (SELECT M.SATIS,(NVL(T_COUNT,0)+NVL(A_COUNT,0)) AS T_COUNT FROM MEMBERINFO M LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(TRADE_NO) AS T_COUNT,MEMBERNO FROM TRADE WHERE MEMBERNO =#SellNo# AND TRADE_STATUS_NO=4 GROUP BY MEMBERNO) T ON M.MEMBERNO = T.MEMBERNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(AUCTIONNO) AS A_COUNT,MEMBERNO FROM AUCTION WHERE MEMBERNO =#SellNo# AND TRADESTATUSNO=9 GROUP BY MEMBERNO) A ON M.MEMBERNO = A.MEMBERNO WHERE M.MEMBERNO=#SellNo# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MEMBERINFO SET GRADE_NO=#Rank# WHERE MEMBERNO=#SellNo#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM TRADE WHERE TRADE_NO != #TradeNo# AND TRADE_WORD_NO=#testNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY C.T_COMMENT_NO DESC) AS NO1,M.NICK,C.MEMBERNO,T_COMMENT_NO, TO_CHAR(C.WRITER_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'||' '||'HH:MI:SS') AS WRITER_DATE,C.T_COMMENT_CONTENT FROM TRADE_COMMENT C INNER JOIN MEMBERINFO M ON C.MEMBERNO = M.MEMBERNO WHERE C.TRADE_WORD_NO=#testNo# AND C.COMMENT_DEL = 1
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TRADE_COMMENT SET COMMENT_DEL = 0 WHERE T_COMMENT_NO = #repleNo#
UPDATE TRADEBOARD SET TRADE_DEL = 0 WHERE TRADE_WORD_NO = (SELECT TRADE_WORD_NO FROM TRADE WHERE TRADE_NO= #TradeNo#)
UPDATE TRADE SET TRADE_STATUS_NO =10 WHERE TRADE_NO = #TradeNo#
UPDATE AUCTION SET ESCROWWHETHER=#Escrow# WHERE AUCTIONNO =#auctionNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT BIDPRICE,AUCTIONPRODUCTNAME,WORDCONTENT,WORDTITLE,TRADESTATUSNO,ESCROWWHETHER,AUCTIONNO,ID,MEMBERNO, PICTURENAME,PICTURENAME1,PICTURENAME2,PICTURENAME3,PICTURENAME4 FROM AUCTIONBOARD B INNER JOIN AUCTION A ON A.AUCTIONWORDNO = B.AUCTIONWORDNO INNER JOIN AUCTIONPICTURE P ON B.AUCTIONWORDNO = P.AUCTIONWORDNO INNER JOIN MEMBERINFO I ON B.MEMBERNO = I.MEMBERNO WHERE AUCTIONWORDNO= (SELECT AUCTIONWORDNO FROM AUCTION WHERE AUCTIONNO=#auctionNo#) AND AUCTIONNO = #auctionNo#

SELECT NAME,PHONE,ADDR,DETAILADDR,EMAIL1,I.EMAIL2,DELIVERY_NAME,DELIVERY_NO FROM AUCTION A INNER JOIN MEMBERINFO I ON A.MEMBERNO = I.MEMBERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN DELIVERYCENTER D ON A.DELIVERY_CENTER_NO = D.DELIVERY_CENTER_NO WHERE A.AUCTIONNO=#auctionNo#

SELECT NAME,PHONE,ADDR,DETAILADDR,EMAIL1,I.EMAIL2,B.MEMBERNO FROM AUCTIONBOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBERINFO I ON B.MEMBERNO = I.MEMBERNO WHERE B.AUCTIONWORDNO =(SELECT AUCTIONWORDNO FROM AUCTION WHERE AUCTIONNO=#auctionNo#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE AUCTION SET TRADESTATUSNO=8, DELIVERY_NO=#deliveryNo#, DELIVERY_CENTER_NO =#selectDelivery#, DELIVERY_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE AUCTIONNO=#auctionNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT MEMBERNO FROM AUCTIONBOARD WHERE AUCTIONWORDNO = (SELECT AUCTIONWORDNO FROM AUCTION WHERE AUCTIONNO =#auctionNo#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE AUCTION SET TRADESTATUSNO=9 WHERE AUCTIONNO = #auctionNo#
